hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #7# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Mido's house#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that you can Boomerang items that are freestanding Heart Pieces in the unrandomized game?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Din's Fire#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #7# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

SFM (Saria).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #the Hover Boots#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Lost Woods Stage#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.
